title: Looking for someone to do a one-time off-meta duo comp!
body:
Hey!
Hit a little boredom streak recently in LoL, and though about some off-meta picks.
Played a game against an ADC Zyra and then watched a video on AP Caitlyn = idea!

Looking for someone to play a game or two with me bot -- **AP **{{champion:51}}  and **ADC **{{champion:143}} , just a bit of fun!

Add me on league, 
Keilosophy (OCE)

EDIT: idc who's who.
EDIT 2: -- im bronze, btw

replies.body: You should try AD Ahri and AP Zyra together. It works really well. <3 Ahri has true damage on her Q regardless of AP, and 3 flashes on an ADC is so big. Her Taunt + Zyra's cc, so guud.
I'm in. Add me on TheHungryPerson.
Added! See you soon! (be on around 4:00pm AEST, most days)
